parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array of user text variables used in MFD.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getUserMFDValue''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - a vehicle with MFD

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> [[getUserMFDValue]] [[vehicle]] [[player]]; // user0 in MFD will return 1</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setUserMFDValue]], [[setUserMFDText]], [[getUserMFDText]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
